snippet: Hamilton E. James, president and chief operating officer of the Blackstone Group, discusses his life and career in a video series created by OneWire, a financial services recruitment firm.
abstract: Hamilton E. James, president and chief operating officer of the Blackstone Group, discusses his life and career in a video series created by OneWire, a financial services recruitment firm.

headline.main: In Video Series, Wall St. Leaders Reflect on Their Careers
